# PUcopulaFit

Fit multivariate distributions using a Partition-of-Unity copula, estimate marginals,
and generate synthetic data. No DataSHIELD, no Python deps.

```r
# install dev version
# remotes::install_github("yourname/PUcopulaFit")
library(PUcopulaFit)

set.seed(1)
toy <- data.frame(
  x = rnorm(200),
  y = rpois(200, 2),
  z = factor(sample(c("a","b","c"), 200, TRUE)),
  w = ordered(sample(1:4, 200, TRUE))
)

pre  <- preprocessData(toy)
cop  <- fitPUcopula(pre$data, driver_strength_factor = 0.5, bin_size = 3)
marg <- estimateMarginals(pre$data, k = 3)
syn  <- generateSynthetic(1000, cop, marg, original_levels = pre$original_levels,
                          original_varnames = names(toy),
                          original_classes  = sapply(toy, class))
head(syn)
